017package org.spongepowered.configurate.transformation;
018
019import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
020import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
021import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
022import org.spongepowered.configurate.ScopedConfigurationNode;
023
024/**
025 * Represents an action to be performed that transforms a node in the configuration tree
026 */
027@FunctionalInterface
028public interface TransformAction<T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> {
029
030    /**
031     * Called at a certain path, with the node at that path.
032     *
033     * <p><strong>Caution:</strong> The state of the <code>inputPath</code> is only guaranteed to be accurate during a run of
034     * the transform function. Use {@link NodePath#getArray()} if the path's state needs to be stored.</p>
035     *
036     * @param inputPath The path of the given node
037     * @param valueAtPath The node at the input path. May be modified
038     * @return A modified path, or null if the path is to stay the same
039     */
040    @Nullable
041    Object[] visitPath(@NonNull NodePath inputPath, @NonNull T valueAtPath);
042
043}
